Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes public bodies to hold public meetings remotely
Summary: Authorizes public bodies to hold public meetings remotely.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to authorizing public bodies to hold public meetings remotely; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
